doc.after: Telecommunication occurs when the exchange of information between two entities communication includes the use of technology Communication technology uses channels to transmit information as electrical signals either over a physical medium such as signal cables or in the form of electromagnetic waves 1 2 3 4 5 6 The word is often used in its plural form telecommunications because it involves many different technologies
